title: HPI 56 - Who’s Pulling Your Strings? - Buddhaghosa
itunes:title: HPI 56 - Who’s Pulling Your Strings? - Buddhaghosa
description: Buddhaghosa, a major figure in the history of Buddhism in Sri Lanka, argues against the need for a self to control and coordinate mental activities.

itunes:author: Peter Adamson, Jonardon Ganeri, Chike Jeffers
